Aakash Shrestha
dcterms:description: The SST-2 dataset is a widely-used resource for evaluating supervised natural language understanding models, specifically focusing on binary sentiment classification. It provides rich linguistic representations and consists of sentiment scores ranging from 0 to 4, where 0 and 1 are negative, 2 is neutral, and 3 and 4 are positive labels.
dcterms:title: SST-2
